answers.answer: He should be taken to the vet immediately, or to an emergency vet clinic over the weekend!  High blood pressure, diabetes, and neurological conditions can cause sudden onset of blindness.  Some sudden onsets of blindness can be reversed with the right treatment if you act quickly enough.

question: My cats pupils are dilated and have been for 2 days and its like he cant see,and i'm worried cause i dont know whats wrong with him .Is he gonna be okay
title: my cats eyes
